sentences.sContent: ...a perfect balance of yin and yang.
...a silver chain with a ying-yang symbol.
sentences.sCn: ...一条带有阴阳符号的银链子。

synos.tran: （苏格兰）一个（等于one）；中国思想里的“阴”（与“阳”相对）；中国的殷代

trans.tranOther: In Chinese philosophy, yin is one of the two opposing principles whose interaction is believed to influence everything in the universe. Yin is negative, dark, and feminine, while yang is positive, bright, and masculine.
